entry.title: Word
entry.summary: So I don't know how you found me. But I am…
entry.content:
So I don't know how you found me. But I am glad you did (I think). I don't market but I think I'm a marketer. I am a lawyer but I haven't practiced in years. I know I can sell but I never want to. One thing I am certain of is I love to write. Or I used to. Before I almost died.

I'm a word nerd. I love words. And if you searched for "iterating.com" and found me that way, you're probably a nerd, too, of some sort.

Right now, I've reduced my life to two words: Iterating and Actualization.

The process that leads to the potential.

entry.title: This is my blog (I think)
entry.summary: What in the heck is going on here? How many words…
entry.content:
What in the heck is going on here?

How many words can I type?

Testing.

123.

This thing on?

Check.

Jibberish.

More jibberish.

entry.title: Hello
entry.summary: Is it me you're looking for?
